name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In order to meet the assessment and avoid falling back into poverty, Guang'an City, Sichuan Province, has adopted the measure of apportionment. All department staff are forced to purchase high-priced agricultural and sideline products from poor households every month according to their level, under the euphemism of consumer assistance.
However, poor households do not have many agricultural and sideline products at home, so they can only go to the market to purchase them and then resell them to civil servants.
